import {Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Oath from '../Oath' import {FaEye, FaEyeSlash, FaExclamationTriangle} from 'react-icons/fa'; import {useState} from 'react'; const Signup = () => { return (
Please login to continue...
please enter name
{showingPsd?:}{toolTip?'hide':'show'}
Forgot password?. Click the link to reset
if you don't have an account click here to create one
) } export default Signup
